poem:
Title: "In the Bustle of Economy, One January Day"

An orbit of numbers spins, sprints – 
Financial cosmos awakens.
The grist of industria, milled by progress,
A tale of rat-race chases. 

Rates cut, rise in rhythm,
Services surge, like sunshine in May.
PMI at eight-month peak - stuns,
Monetary minuet, in ordered array.

Turn, world, to the song of the market,
In January's grey, find your new day.
